scripts.development: if [ -z ${NODE_WEBPACK_PATH} ]; then NODE_WEBPACK_PATH=$(pwd); fi; cross-env NODE_ENV=development ${NODE_WEBPACK_PATH}/node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --hide-modules --config=${NODE_WEBPACK_PATH}/node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
scripts.hot: if [ -z ${NODE_WEBPACK_PATH} ]; then NODE_WEBPACK_PATH=$(pwd); fi; cross-env NODE_ENV=development ${NODE_WEBPACK_PATH}/node_modules/webpack-dev-server/bin/webpack-dev-server.js --inline --hot --config=${NODE_WEBPACK_PATH}/node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
scripts.prod: if [ -z ${NODE_WEBPACK_PATH} ]; then NODE_WEBPACK_PATH=$(pwd); fi; npm run production
scripts.production: if [ -z ${NODE_WEBPACK_PATH} ]; then NODE_WEBPACK_PATH=$(pwd); fi; cross-env NODE_ENV=production ${NODE_WEBPACK_PATH}/node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --no-progress --hide-modules --config=${NODE_WEBPACK_PATH}/node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js
